unparsed_output: No provision has been made in the holding Company accounts in respect of estimated total liability for future payment of gratuity of Rs. 8,55,68,941 including for the current year Rs. 44,96,703 (Previous Year Rs. 8,10,72,238 and Rs. 57,85,988 respectively) determined on the basis of actuarial valuation, as the holding Company's practice is to account for the same as and when due for payment.
